channel.title: Crow T. Robot on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Crow T. Robot on My New Hugo Site

item.title: The Podcasting Puppet Master
item.description: [whitebox] Hey all, Ernie here with a fresh piece from David Buck, who last came to you with a piece on DOS nostalgia. This time, he highlights the story of a guy who helped bring you the most recent season of MST3K, among other things. [big]Today in Tedium: From the early days of civilization to modern day pop culture, puppetry has always been used to tell stories. What happens when you mix music, comedy and puppets?
